[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_module=”1664″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” module_class=”fp-page-header” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _dynamic_attributes=”title,background_image” _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|300|||||||” title_font_size=”90px” content_link_text_color=”#FFFFFF” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.78)” background_color_gradient_start_position=”60%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9mZWF0dXJlZF9pbWFnZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7fX0=@” min_height=”600px” min_height_tablet=”420px” min_height_phone=”200px” min_height_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”50px” title_font_size_phone=”32px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_shadow_style=”preset3″ content_link_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” content_link_text_color__hover=”#FEC357″]

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”22px” header_2_font=”|||on|||||”]

Children experiencing homelessness and their families need your help now

 

Family Promise is the leading national nonprofit addressing family homelessness, providing homelessness prevention, emergency shelter, workforce development, education, financial capability, health and wellness, and so much more.

Family Promise is a tax-exempt 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. Your gift is tax-deductible as allowed by law.

Family homelessness knows no season. Please consider joining the Promise Guild with a recurring monthly gift to give children in need the promise of home all year long. Simply check the “Automatically repeat this donation each month as a Promise Guild member” box after selecting your donation amount.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

DONATE TODAY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”]

  • Donation Amount

  • Please provide a full mailing address for us to send a notification.

  • Donor Information

  • Payment Information

  • Given current restrictions and delays in receiving mail, please consider making a gift online instead of sending a check. Thank you!

    If you would like to send us a donation using check or credit card by mail, please click here for a printable mail-in donation form which includes our mailing address.

  • $0.00
  • MasterCard
    Visa
    Supported Credit Cards: MasterCard, Visa
      
  • This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F2F2F2″ custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”|||on|||||” header_3_font_size=”27px” custom_margin=”||21px|||”]

Other Ways to Give

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/donate/join-the-promise-guild/” button_text=”Monthly Giving Through the Promise Guild” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”d5de23d2-71e6-4439-a17f-abaf0afcda96″ custom_margin=”||12px|||” custom_padding=”10px|38px|10px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: block; width: 100%; line-height: 1.3em !important;” custom_css_after=”position: absolute; right: 10px; top: calc(50% – 13px);”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_button button_url=”/donate/other-ways-to-give/#local” button_text=”Support a Local Affiliate” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”d5de23d2-71e6-4439-a17f-abaf0afcda96″ custom_margin=”||12px|||” custom_padding=”10px|38px|10px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: block; width: 100%; line-height: 1.3em !important;” custom_css_after=”position: absolute; right: 10px; top: calc(50% – 13px);”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_button button_url=”/donate/other-ways-to-give/#estate” button_text=”Planned Giving Through Your Estate” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”d5de23d2-71e6-4439-a17f-abaf0afcda96″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|38px|10px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: block; width: 100%; line-height: 1.3em !important;” custom_css_after=”position: absolute; right: 10px; top: calc(50% – 13px);”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_button button_url=”/donate/other-ways-to-give/#stock” button_text=”Give Stock” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”d5de23d2-71e6-4439-a17f-abaf0afcda96″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|38px|10px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: block; width: 100%; line-height: 1.3em !important;” custom_css_after=”position: absolute; right: 10px; top: calc(50% – 13px);”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_button button_url=”/donate/other-ways-to-give/#matching” button_text=”Matching gifts through your employer” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”d5de23d2-71e6-4439-a17f-abaf0afcda96″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|38px|10px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: block; width: 100%; line-height: 1.3em !important;” custom_css_after=”position: absolute; right: 10px; top: calc(50% – 13px);”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_button button_url=”/donate/other-ways-to-give/#loyalty” button_text=”Become a Member of our Loyalty Circle” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”d5de23d2-71e6-4439-a17f-abaf0afcda96″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|38px|10px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: block; width: 100%; line-height: 1.3em !important;” custom_css_after=”position: absolute; right: 10px; top: calc(50% – 13px);”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_button button_url=”/donate/other-ways-to-give/#mail” button_text=”Mail your donation” disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”d5de23d2-71e6-4439-a17f-abaf0afcda96″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|38px|10px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: block; width: 100%; line-height: 1.3em !important;” custom_css_after=”position: absolute; right: 10px; top: calc(50% – 13px);” disabled=”on”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_button button_url=”/donate/other-ways-to-give/#daf” button_text=”Make a gift through Donor-advised fund or bank transfer” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”d5de23d2-71e6-4439-a17f-abaf0afcda96″ custom_margin=”||10px|||” custom_padding=”10px|38px|10px||true|false” custom_css_main_element=”display: block; width: 100%; line-height: 1.3em !important;” custom_css_after=”position: absolute; right: 10px; top: calc(50% – 13px);”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/4StarSquare-charitynavigator.jpeg” title_text=”4StarSquare-charitynavigator” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” max_height=”178px” custom_margin=”90px||||false|false”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/AIR.png” title_text=”AIR” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_accordion disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” disabled=”on” locked=”off”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Support a Local Family Promise Affiliate” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”]

Find your nearest Family Promise location

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Planned giving through your estate” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Planned Giving is an effective and mutually beneficial way of giving to Family Promise. By making a planned gift, you assist us in our mission to help low-income and homeless families reclaim and maintain their independence, while enjoying the benefits of capital gains tax savings, increased income, and income-tax savings. Most importantly, a planned gift maximizes your giving potential while providing for your future financial security and that of your loved ones.

Learn more here.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Give Stock” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]

Donating appreciated stock can provide you with significant tax benefits. Your stock donation to Family Promise provides you with a charitable deduction for the full, fair-market value of stocks and securities held longer than one year. Also, by donating appreciated stock to Family Promise you will avoid paying capital gains taxes on any profit.

To transfer stock to Family Promise, please provide your broker with the following information:
DTC # 0226 (Fidelity Investments)
Acct #: x59125040
Name on Account – Family Promise
Please be sure your name and address is provided so we may acknowledge your gift and provide you with a tax receipt.

Other information:
Family Promise’s Federal Tax ID #: 52-1591461
Fidelity’s Phone: (800)544-4442

Should you have any questions, please contact us.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Matching gifts through your employer” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” open=”off”]Many employers offer programs to match their employees’ contributions to charitable organizations. Check if your company has a matching gift program[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#472D5B”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

FIND YOUR AFFILIATE

Enter your zip code or address to find the Family Promise Affiliates in your area.


[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://familypromise.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/IMG_6069-scaled-1.jpg” title_text=”IMG_6069-scaled” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
